resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81469</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81469</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4328</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tillage farm field study</string>
            <string language="es">Estudio de campo de granja de labranza</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar Allamuigh ar Fheirm Curaíochta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ackerbaubauernhof fangen Studie auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude sur le terrain de ferme de labourage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudo de campo da fazenda do tillage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studio diretto dell'azienda agricola di 
lavorazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτη αγροτικών πεδίων οργώματος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupils will visit a Tillage farm and carry out specific studies on the farm, thereby gaining an accurate insight into the way a tillage farm functions.     </string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos visitarán una granja de labranza y llevarán a cabo estudios específicos sobre la granja para saber cómo funciona.     </string>
            <string language="ga">Tabharfaidh na daltaí cuairt ar fheirm curaíochta agus déanfaidh siad staidéir speisialta ar an bhfeirm, agus dá réir sin, gheobhaidh siad léargas ar an mbealach a fheidhmíonn feirm curaíochta.     </string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Agricultural Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias. Agricultura. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht Talmhaíochta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schüler besichtigen einen Ackerbaubauernhof 
und spezifische Untersuchungen über den Bauernhof durchzuführen, 
dadurch ergewinnt ergewinnt einen genauen Einblick in die Methode, 
arbeitet ein Ackerbaubauernhof.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les élèves visiteront une ferme de labourage et
effectuer des études spécifiques à la ferme, gagnant de ce fait une
perspicacité précise dans la voie une ferme de labourage fonctionne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os alunos visitarão uma fazenda do tillage e 
para realizar estudos específicos na fazenda, ganhando desse modo uma
introspecção exata na maneira uma fazenda do tillage funciona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi visiteranno un podere di lavorazione 
ed effettuare gli studi specifici sul podere, quindi guadagnante una 
comprensione esatta nel modo un podere di lavorazione funziona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα επισκεφτούν ένα αγρόκτημα οργώματος και
θα πραγματοποιήσουν τις συγκεκριμένες μελέτες για το αγρόκτημα, με
αυτόν τον τρόπο αποκτώντας μια ακριβή επίγνωση στον τρόπο 
λειτουργίες οργώματος αγροκτημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Agrarwissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Science Agronomique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência Agricultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza Agricola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωργική επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
